name: The Incorrigible
description:
We are playing a story of a spy that tries to steal briefs from another country’s intelligence office in WW2 in an alternative universe. But there is one major problem. He has to reach the extraction zones before the bombardment that is going to be done by his country.

 

Our character’s story comes together with a platforming-speedrunning game with deck building. The character is just not running around and jumping. He can use his special athletic abilities while overcome the challenging obstacles.

NOTE:   There are some bugs in this version so if you want to play the game without encountering those issues, there's a fixed version in my profile.
